short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Automatically mute and skip YouTube ads.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Curse your YouTube viewing experience with Cursed Ads. The extension automatically mutes the audio, saving you from hearing entrepreneurship grifters, praise of AI Ponzi apps for trading, and late stage consumer NPCs. When the "Skip Ad" prompt surfaces, the extension skips to the actual video. The ad videos get a progressively more cursed visual treatment as time goes by.



Release notes:

0.0.3:
- Adapt skip button detection.

0.0.2:
- Initial release.
